title: Khan - Space Shanty 1972 / 2004 Remaster & Bonus
description:
Khans's sole album is a splendid example of a fusion of Canterbury-flavoured Rock combined with Jazz and Space-Rock influences, feat. super spacey guitar work and outrageous organ playing with a tight, busy rhythm section. Best known as the album that first brought the guitar playing talents of Steve Hillage to public prominence.
 
Space Shanty is a true masterpiece, a must-have mind-blowing Prog Rock album.

2004 digitally remastered and expanded edition featuring two bonus tracks. 



Khan

 Space Shanty

 1972

 2004 Remaster



 CD / 2008 / 320Kbps


 Tracklist:

 1. Space Shanty (Inc. The Cobalt Sequence and March of the Sine Squadrons) 

 2. Stranded (Effervescent Psychonovelty No. 5)

 3. Mixed Up Man of the Mountains

 4. Driving to Amsterdam 

 5. Stargazers

 6. Hollow Stone (Escape of the Space Pirates) 

 7. Break the Chains [#]
 
 8. Mixed Up Man of the Mountains [First Version][#]
